description: The file contains CSS styling rules and variables for managing themes in a web application, particularly for light and dark themes. It includes styles for various components of the application like buttons, headers, and logos.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main container for the application that sets text alignment, background color, and other styling properties.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header styling for the application, including background color, flex properties, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Link styling within the application, particularly color and transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, padding, and hover effects.
